title: Bug Splat
body:
Is there a way to prevent the Bug Splat error from happening? This keeps happening more frequently and its making me lose normal and ranked games. I am actually repairing from a bug splat right now as I'm typing this. Please help! I don't know if its my PC or something I can control!

Thank you!

replies.body: Bugsplats usually happen from factors like bad drivers or game files, but it is preventable!  Try out each step in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot this and tune things up, just be sure to test it in a custom.  That should do the trick!
